app.pubKey: <Signing public key provided on registering with Civic>
app.prvKey: <Signing private key provided on registering with Civic>
app.encPubKey: <Encryption public key provided on registering with Civic>
app.encPrvKey: <Encryption private key provided on registering with Civic>
app.appSecret: <App secret provided on registering with Civic>

sessionToken.prvKey: <EC private key used for generating Civic session tokens>
sessionToken.pubKey: <EC public key used for verifying Civic session tokens>
